title: My Portfolio Website
summary: Personal website portfolio built with Next.js and Tailwind.

body.raw:
## Overview
Short intro.

## Research
Notes about users.

### Surveys
What you learned.

## Design
Wireframes, states, a11y choices.

## Implementation
Stack, components, performance.

## Outcome
Results and next steps.
